General.Name: Pembangunan Graha Lestari Tbk
General.Description: PT Pembangunan Graha Lestari Indah Tbk engages in the hotel and restaurant businesses in Indonesia. The company owns and operates a hotel under the Travellers Suites name; bakehouse under the Le Chic Bakehouse name; and a banquet and restaurant under the Tia Café name. It also generates hydroelectricity power. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Medan, Indonesia.
